KeyframeAnimation (Overview / Examples »)

animation. KeyframeAnimation

new KeyframeAnimation

Creates a KeyframeAnimation instance

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
clock EventEmitter

An object that emits a 'tick' event and has a toFrameNumber method.
duration number | string

The duration, either as frames (number) or as seconds (e.g. '1s')
properties Object <optional>

The keyframes to animate through
options Object <optional>

Additional options

Properties
Name Type Argument Default Description
easing String <optional>

Easing function
delay Number <optional>

Delay before animation begins, in ms
subjects Object <optional>

The subjects (e.g. DisplayObjects) of the keyframe-animation
strategy string | Object <optional>
 'attr'

The strategy to use to get and set properties on the subjects.
Returns:

An KeyframeAnimation instance

Type
KeyframeAnimation

Mixes In

  • EventEmitter

Methods

addSubject

Adds a subject with given strategy to the keyframe-animation

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
subject Object

The subject (usually a DisplayObject)
strategy mixed <optional>
 'attr'

The set/get strategy to use - 'attr': The 'attr' method of the object is used (for DisplayObjects) - 'prop': Normal property setting and getting is used - Object with 'set(subject, values)' and 'get(subject)' methods.

addSubjects

Adds multiple subjects with given strategy to the animation

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
subjects Array

Array of subjects to add
strategy mixed <optional>
 'attr'

The set/get strategy to use - 'attr': The 'attr' method of the object is used (for DisplayObjects) - 'prop': Normal property setting and getting is used - Object with 'set(subject, values)' and 'get(subject)' methods.

begin

Begins the animation

pause

Pauses an animation

play

Starts or resumes an animation

Optionally changes the subjects of the animation.

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
subjects Object <optional>
strategy mixed <optional>
 'attr'

The set/get strategy to use - 'attr': The 'attr' method of the object is used (for DisplayObjects) - 'prop': Normal property setting and getting is used - Object with 'set(subject, values)' and 'get(subject, propertyNames)' methods.

removeSubject

Removes a subject with given strategy to the animation

Parameters:
Name Type Description
subject Object

The subject to remove

removeSubjects

Removes a subject with given strategy to the animation

Parameters:
Name Type Description
subjects Array

Array of subjects to remove

reset

Resets an animation (so it's ready to begin again)

setSubject

Sets the subject of the animation while wiping all current subjects

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
subject Object
strategy mixed <optional>
 'attr'

The set/get strategy to use - 'attr': The 'attr' method of the object is used (for DisplayObjects) - 'prop': Normal property setting and getting is used - Object with 'set(subject, values)' and 'get(subject)' methods.

setSubjects

Sets the subjects of the animation while wiping all current subjects

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
subject Object
strategy mixed <optional>
 'attr'

The set/get strategy to use - 'attr': The 'attr' method of the object is used (for DisplayObjects) - 'prop': Normal property setting and getting is used - Object with 'set(subject, values)' and 'get(subject)' methods.
Returns:
Type
this
